Functions
getTargetTurnHeading

Returns current target_turn_heading

Returns

a float that's assigned to target_turn_heading.

setTargetTurnHeading

Sets a degree for the zumo to turn based on current compass position of zumo

Parameters
turn_degree

integer representing an angle for the zumo to turn

calculate_new_heading

calculates a degree for turning provided a compass position and degree turn

Parameters
current_heading

float that represents a position of the compass

turn_degree

integer representing an angle for the zumo to turn

Returns

a float that represents an angle for the zumo to turn to.

getRelativeHeading

Yields the angle difference in degrees between two headings

Parameters
heading_from

a float that represents starting angle

heading_to

a float that represents ending angle

Returns

a float that reprsents a relative distance

averageHeading

Returns a current degree reading of the zumo's compass Returns: float returns a current heading of the zumo's compass
